title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Competency-Based Online Learning for Predicting Micromasters Learner Success

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level scientific theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three key behavioral indicators (schedule participation, assessment interaction, etc.) for predicting success in micro-mastery courses
Learners can design practical strategies to establish and implement daily learning plans in an LMS environment with over 80% adherence

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
